author: Graeme Campbell
title: BAPE Wants to Keep You Cozy With Its New Indigo Essentials Capsule
text:
Visit the original post to see all 15 images from this gallery. 
Brand: BAPE
Season: Spring 2017
Key Pieces: The bandana (slide 16) was surely created to be wrapped around the head of Metro Boomin .
Editorâ€™s Notes: Cherished Japanese streetwear giant BAPE continues its spring 2017 rollout, this time with a collection of indigo-dyed essentials which are darker than the ocean floor. The iconic shark and primate head motif can be seen across T-shirts, shirts, shorts, and various other accessories.
FIND OUT MORE If you like what you see above, why not finish the look with some BAPE eyewear ?
